Title: One Percent
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Denise ThÃ©, Melissa Scrivner-Love, Sean Hennen (story editor), Erik Mountain (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Taraji P. Henson, Kevin Chapman, Michael Emerson
Plot: A tech billionaire's erratic behavior threatens to destroy his business empire, which may mean one of his subordinates wants to put an end to him, if one of the many competitors he's crushed doesn't do it first.
